name: Trade License
text: [wood, stone, steel, gems]

name: Trade License
text:
[wood, stone, steel, gems]

When discarding, you may sell {7 * c.stone / v} {tag} for {v * 1.5} gold each.

name: Lumberjack
text: {x * v / 2} gold -> {np.power(x, 1.3)} {tag}

name: Miner
text: {x * v / 2} gold -> {np.power(x, 1.3)} {tag}

name: Smelter
text: {x * 0.4 * v / c.stone} stone {x * v * 0.2} gold -> {np.power(x, 1.3)} {tag}

name: Lapidary
text: {x * 0.2 * v / c.wood} {x * v * 0.4} gold -> {np.power(x, 1.3)} {tag}

name: Scholar
text: {np.power(x, 1.5)} wood {4 * np.power(x, 1.5)} gold -> draw {x} research card[, s, s]

name: Forager
text: {np.power(x, 0.8) * 0.4 * c.stone} -> draw {x} card[, s, s] from the resource deck

name: Big Order
text: Sell {x * sz_m * 10 * c.stone / v} {tag} for {2.5 * v * prc_m} gold each

name: Auctioneer
text:
{x * 2.2 * c.stone / c.wood} wood -> {0.5 * c.wood * take_m} gold each
{x * 2.2 * c.stone/ c.stone} stone -> {0.5 * c.stone * take_m} gold each
{x * 2.2 * c.stone / c.steel} steel -> {0.5 * c.steel * take_m} gold each
{x * 2.2 * c.stone / c.gems} gems -> {0.5 * c.gems * take_m} gold each

name: Trader
text: Discard {x} resource card[, s, s] -> draw {x} resource card[, s, s]

name: Career Change
text: Discard a worker you have in play -> recruit the top [Lumberjack, Miner, Smelter, Lapidary] for free

name: HFT
text: Take the first player token

name: Trade License
text:
[wood, stone, steel, gems, wood, stone, steel, gems]

Before auctions, you must reveal this card and resolve its effect.
Townspeople orders in {tag} for this auction are [halved, halved, halved, halved, doubled, doubled, doubled, doubled] in size [(round down), (round down), (round down), (round down),,,,]

name: Found a Buyer
text:
Pick one:

{x * 12 *  c.wood_sz_m * c.stone / c.wood} wood -> {1.5 * c.wood * prov_m * c.wood_prc_m} gold each
{x * 12 * c.stone_sz_m * c.stone / c.stone} stone -> {1.5 * c.stone * prov_m * c.stone_prc_m} gold each
{x * 12 * c.steel_sz_m * c.stone / c.steel} steel -> {1.5 * c.steel * prov_m * c.steel_prc_m} gold each
{x * 12 * c.gems_sz_m * c.stone / c.gems} gems -> {1.5 * c.gems * prov_m * c.gems_prc_m} gold each

name: <Carpenter, Mason, Blacksmith, Jeweler>
text: I need {x * sz_m * 3 * c.stone / v} {tag}, I won't pay more than {1.5 * v * prc_m} gold each.

name: <Carpenter, Mason, Blacksmith, Jeweler>
text: I have {x * 3 * c.stone / v} {tag} for sale, I won't sell for less than {0.8 * v * take_m} gold each.

name: Tax
text: All players must pay {x} gold for each card in their hand right before auction this turn.

name: Big Buyer
text:
Add this card to the end of the next auction; all players may trade with it

I need {x * sz_m * 32 * c.stone / v} {tag}, I won't pay more than {3.1 * v * prc_m} gold each.

name: New Faces
text: Put the top card of each standard worker decks on the bottom of its deck. You may immediately recruit one of the new available workers (you still need to pay costs).

name: Foresight
text: Look at the top {x+1} cards of the Market Events deck, then shuffle them into it.

name: Supply Cache
text: Each player may buy up to {1.6 * x} {tag} for {0.2 * v} each.

name: Merchant License
text:
wood stone steel gems

You must reveal this after trading. You may not take any actions this work phase.
For each auction, you may, before it occurs, send one order that will be executed immediately (the townsperson must still be willing to trade at your price).
Every time you provide the full size to a townsperson, gain {c.stone * 1.8} gold.

name: Volatile Conditions
text: Draw and resolve two more Market Events

name: Converter
text:
Each player may use this as part of their use workers action.

2 [wood, stone] -> {tag}
